name: Totem Warrior
description: A spiritual warrior who channels the might of animal totems to fuel a supernatural rage.

3.name: Spirit Seeker
3.description: You can cast the beast sense and speak with animals spells, but only as rituals.

3.name: Totem Spirit
3.description: You choose a totem spirit and gain its feature while raging, such as the bear's resilience or the eagle's mobility. You must make or acquire a totem representing your spirit.

6.name: Aspect of the Beast
6.description: Gain a magical benefit based on your totem animal, such as the bear's strength or the wolf's tracking prowess.

10.name: Spirit Walker
10.description: You can cast commune with nature as a ritual, calling upon your totem spirit for guidance.

14.name: Totemic Attunement
14.description: Gain a powerful ability based on a totem animal of your choice while raging, such as the bear's protection or the eagle's flight.
